page.title: 05LANGFORD BUDVILLE
page.content: Langford Budville is a big village for the area with a population of about 200. It has a new estate which was built in 1982,it also has quite a few little fields surrounding it.There is a pub called The Martlet and a shop.The village green is used for football and running.The village has three farms, one near the road,one near the village green and the other is opposite the little estate near by.Langford Budville is about 3 miles from the nearest town which is Wellington.The common thats there joins up with nearly all the villages around.There is a telephone box opposite the church.There are bus services to Wellington and Wiveliscombe.
